abstract.shortdesc: In this module you will put your planning to work as you prepare and serve your PB&J meal.

tutorialModuleBody.learningObjectives:
Learning objectivesAfter completing the lessons in this module you will know how to do the following tasks:
Prepare a PB&J meal
Serve the PB&J meal, with appetizers (chips and salsa), dessert (cookies), and milk
tutorialModuleBody.timeRequired: Time requiredThis module should take approximately 15 minutes to complete.
tutorialModuleBody.prerequisites: PrerequisitesYou should complete Module 1: Planning the meal.
